languages.text: "Довольно! Ты, Мастер шепотов, не должен допустить, чтобы мой наследник превратился в безмозглого мутанта и издох под огнем блюстителей! Делайте что угодно, но верните мне Эдельтрада!"

traits.locale_text: "Довольно! Ты, Мастер шепотов, не должен допустить, чтобы мой наследник превратился в безмозглого мутанта и издох под огнем блюстителей! Делайте что угодно, но верните мне Эдельтрада!"

languages.text: "Enough! Master of Whispers, you must not allow my heir to turn into a mindless mutant and to perish under enforcer fire! Do whatever it takes to bring Edelthrad back to me!"
languages.original_text: "Довольно! Ты, Мастер шепотов, не должен допустить, чтобы мой наследник превратился в безмозглого мутанта и издох под огнем блюстителей! Делайте что угодно, но верните мне Эдельтрада!"

traits.locale_text: "Enough! You, Master of Whispers, must not allow my heir to turn into a mindless mutant and to perish from enforcer's fire! Do anything but bring me back Edelthrad!"
"Enough! Master of Whispers, you must not allow my heir to turn into a mindless mutant and to perish under enforcer fire! Do whatever it takes to bring Edelthrad back to me!"
"Enough! Master of Whispers, you must not allow my heir to turn into a mindless mutant and to perish under enforcer fire! Do whatever it takes to bring Edelthrad back to me!"
"Enough! Master of Whispers, you must not allow my heir to turn into a mindless mutant and to perish under enforcer fire! Do whatever it takes to bring Edelthrad back to me!"

languages.text: "Genug! Meister des Geflüsters, Ihr werdet nicht zulassen, dass mein Erbe zu einem hirnlosen Mutanten wird und von Enforcers niedergeschossen wird! Tut, was nötig ist, um Edelthrad zu mir zurückzubringen!"
languages.original_text: "Enough! Master of Whispers, you must not allow my heir to turn into a mindless mutant and to perish under enforcer fire! Do whatever it takes to bring Edelthrad back to me!"

traits.locale_text: "Genug! Meister des Geflüsters, Ihr werdet nicht zulassen, dass mein Erbe zu einem hirnlosen Mutanten wird und von Enforcers niedergeschossen wird! Tut, was nötig ist, um Edelthrad zu mir zurückzubringen!"

languages.text: « Assez ! Maître des murmures, vous devez empêcher mon héritier de se transformer en mutant décérébré et de mourir sous les tirs des prévôts ! Faites tout ce qui est en votre pouvoir pour me ramener Edelthrad en vie ! »
languages.original_text: "Enough! Master of Whispers, you must not allow my heir to turn into a mindless mutant and to perish under enforcer fire! Do whatever it takes to bring Edelthrad back to me!"

traits.locale_text: « Assez ! Maître des murmures, vous devez empêcher mon héritier de se transformer en mutant décérébré et de mourir sous les tirs des prévôts ! Faites tout ce qui est en votre pouvoir pour me ramener Edelthrad en vie ! »

languages.text: “够了！低语之主，你绝不能让我的继承人变成没有灵魂的变种人，在执法者的枪炮之下丧生！我要你不惜一切代价，把艾德萨德安然带回我身边！”
languages.original_text: "Enough! Master of Whispers, you must not allow my heir to turn into a mindless mutant and to perish under enforcer fire! Do whatever it takes to bring Edelthrad back to me!"

traits.locale_text: “够了！低语之主，你绝不能让我的继承人变成没有灵魂的变种人，在镇压者的枪炮之下丧生！我要你不惜一切代价，把艾德萨德安然带回我身边！”

languages.text: 「もういい！囁きの主よ、私の跡継ぎが心無い変異体に変わり、エンフォーサーの銃火の中で死なせてはならない！エデルスラドを私のところに取り戻すため、どんな手でも尽くせ！」
languages.original_text: "Enough! Master of Whispers, you must not allow my heir to turn into a mindless mutant and to perish under enforcer fire! Do whatever it takes to bring Edelthrad back to me!"

traits.locale_text: 「もういい！囁きの主よ、私の跡継ぎを心無い変異体に変え、エンフォーサーの火で死なせてはならない！エデルスラドを私のところに取り戻すためなら、何でもしてくれ！」
「もういい！囁きの主よ、私の跡継ぎが心無い変異体に変わり、エンフォーサーの銃火の中で死なせてはならない！エデルスラドを私のところに取り戻すため、どんな手でも尽くせ！」

languages.text: «¡Basta, maestro de susurros! ¡Debes impedir que mi heredero se convierta en un descerebrado mutante y muera a manos de mi propio personal de seguridad! ¡Haz lo que sea para rescatar a Edelthrad!».
languages.original_text: "Enough! Master of Whispers, you must not allow my heir to turn into a mindless mutant and to perish under enforcer fire! Do whatever it takes to bring Edelthrad back to me!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Basta, maestro de susurros! ¡Debes impedir que mi heredero se convierta en un descerebrado mutante y muera a manos de mi propio personal de seguridad! ¡Haz lo que sea para rescatar a Edelthrad!».

languages.text: "Kes! Fısıltı Üstadı, vârisimin beyinsiz bir mutanta dönüşmesine ve infazcı silahına hedef olmasına engel ol! Ne yap et, Edelthrad'ı bana geri getir!"
languages.original_text: "Enough! Master of Whispers, you must not allow my heir to turn into a mindless mutant and to perish under enforcer fire! Do whatever it takes to bring Edelthrad back to me!"

traits.locale_text: "Kes! Fısıltı Üstadı, vârisimin beyinsiz bir mutanta dönüşmesine ve infazcı silahına hedef olmasına engel ol! Ne yap et, Edelthrad'ı bana geri getir!"

languages.original_text: "Enough! Master of Whispers, you must not allow my heir to turn into a mindless mutant and to perish under enforcer fire! Do whatever it takes to bring Edelthrad back to me!"
